column1: Global Environmental Challenges - MSc by Research
column5: Conduct an independent environmental research project on a subject of your choosing on the Cabot Institute MSc by research in Global Environmental Challenges.This unique programme allows you to apply for a pre-designed project or propose your own, working with expert supervisors at the University. You will work on a research project that is assessed by a thesis and viva examination, while engaging in a training programme designed to enhance your career prospects. There are opportunities to develop research skills, interdisciplinarity and communication alongside a cohort of likeminded individuals.
column9: 2 years full time / 4 years part time
